ZMap Changes/Fixes [from cvs]
  • Browse CVS
  • src/zmapWindow/zmapWindowFeatureList.c: Some debug code to attempt to track down RT #66832
  • src/zmapWindow/zmapWindowDNA.c: Quick bit of code to clear up the column in the window when using and closing window.
  • src/zmapWindow/: zmapWindowDNAList.c, zmapWindowDNAList.h: Fix mistake of getting str value for frame rather than the enum value (which we weren't storing anyway)
  • src/configure.ac: Fix finding GLIB_GENMARSHAL when in location only in PATH set for configure...
  • src/configure.ac: annoying....
  • src/include/ZMap/zmapConfigStrings.h: strings for pfetch preferences
  • src/: zmapWindow/zmapWindowFeature.c, zmapWindow/zmapWindow_P.h, zmapWindow/zmapWindowPreferences.c, lib/Makefile.am: Use preferences from the ZMap config file rather than the hard coded ones.
  • src/runconfig: 64 bit config
  • doc/Release_notes/release_notes.2008_06_06.shtml: new zmap release notes for 6 June 2008
  • src/include/ZMap/zmapWebPages.h: update release notes file to release_notes.2008_06_06.shtml
  • doc/Release_notes/LAST_RELEASE_DATE.txt: update last release notes to 06/06/2008
  • src/zmapUtils/zmapUtils_P.h: /var/tmp/zmap.17779/ZMap/scripts/versioner run by zmap
  • src/configure.ac: That was the wrong thing to do
  • src/libpfetch/libpfetch.c: fix pedantic compiler
  • src/include/ZMap/zmapUtils.h: forgotten prototype
  • src/zmapUtils/zmapLogging.c: fix pedantic compiler
  • src/zmapServer/acedb/models.wrm: initial version of acedb classes to represent zmap styles.
  • src/include/ZMap/zmapFeature.h: authors change.
  • src/zmapWindow/: zmapWindowFeature.c, zmapWindowPreferences.c, zmapWindow_P.h: more configurable pfetching
  • src/include/ZMap/zmapConfigStrings.h: more configurable pfetching
  • src/: include/ZMap/zmapUrl.h, include/ZMap/zmapView.h, include/ZMap/zmapServerProtocol.h, zmapServer/zmapServer.h, zmapServer/zmapServerProtocolHandler.c, zmapServer/zmapServerPrototype.h, zmapServer/zmapServer_P.h: zMapURL -> ZMapURL
  • src/: zmapServer/zmapServer.c, zmapServer/das/dasServer.c, zmapServer/file/fileServer.c, zmapUtils/zmapUrl.c, zmapView/zmapView.c, zmapView/zmapViewUtils.c, zmapView/zmapView_P.h: zMapURL -> ZMapURL
  • src/zmapServer/acedb/acedbServer.c: zMapURL -> ZMapURL And additions for method parsing for Deferred tag
  • src/zmapServer/acedb/models.wrm: New Deferred tag
  • src/include/ZMap/zmapEnum.h: Borrowed code from gnu cash to do enum <-> string conversion including definition.
  • src/zmapUtils/zmapGUITreeView.c: Fix for RT 69655 - resizing - column sort index bug
  • src/zmapUtils/zmapGUINotebook.c: Fix for RT 69655 - column sorting Fix for RT 69653 - blixem preferences not saved
  • src/: include/ZMap/zmapStyle.h, zmapFeature/zmapStyle.c: Use new zmapEnum.h #ifdef'd out gobject stuff
  • src/zmapFeature/zmapStyle_P.h: Use new zmapEnum.h #ifdef'd out gobject stuff temporarily include zmapStyle_I.h as this file will be removed.
  • src/zmapFeature/zmapStyle_I.h: Use new zmapEnum.h previous contents of zmapStyle_P.h plus #ifdef'd out gobject stuff
  • src/: zmapFeature/zmapFeatureTypes.c, zmapWindow/zmapWindowNavigator.c: incorporate slight struct name change in prep for gobject version
  • src/zmapWindow/zmapWindowColConfig.c: Add scrollability in case of more columns than vertical screen space. Need refining!
  • src/: zmapUtils/zmapBase.c, zmapUtils/zmapBase_I.h, include/ZMap/zmapBase.h: first commit of base class
  • src/zmapWindow/zmapWindow.c: fix for RT 69860, caused by bad order in resetCanvas
  • src/zmapUtils/zmapFileUtils.c: fix for RT 70010, file mode requested to be 644 rather than 600...
  • src/zmapWindow/: zmapWindowDNAList.c, zmapWindowDNAList.h: fix for RT 70038, a small mix up of zmap coords and screen coords...
  • src/libpfetch/libpfetch.c: fix erroneous copy paste...
  • src/libcurlobject/: libcurlobject_I.h, libcurlobject.c: add debug
  • src/: zmapWindow/zmapWindowDNA.c, include/ZMap/zmapString.h, zmapUtils/zmapString.c: remove all spaces from entry string as per RT 69968.
  • src/zmapWindow/zmapWindowColConfig.c: correctly resize the config widget.
  • src/: include/ZMap/zmapStyle.h, zmapFeature/zmapFeatureTypes.c, zmapFeature/zmapStyle.c, zmapFeature/zmapStyle_I.h, zmapFeature/zmapStyle_P.h: Styles implemented as GObjects, initial version...
  • src/zmapUtils/: zmapBase.c, zmapBase_I.h: Small change to base object
  • src/zmapWindow/zmapWindowNavigator.c: Fix for multiple drawing when navigator is not drawn until after reverse complementing
  • src/zmapWindow/zmapWindowSearch.c: Remove leading and trailing white space from entry text. Tidy up code a little
  • src/lib/Makefile.am: compile all files added...

Aceb Changes/Fixes [from cvs]
  • Browse CVS
  • w4/command.c: add unix like -c option to parse cmd. to specify a string to parse.
  • w2/gex.c, wh/gex.h: add hack to allow turning on/off modality, alternative is to change many, many files.
  • whelp/Tree.html: document new Alt-< short cut in tree display.
  • w6/treedisp.c: add update mode edit/delete shortcuts, add Alt-< shortcut to jump to extreme leftmost of a branch.
  • w7/fmapgene.c: make 'fix temp gene' dialog non-modal.
  • w7/gmapconvert.c: Fix bug/oversite in tag 2 reading code for 2 point data causing global likelihood to fail.
  • w7/gmapdata.c: fix small bug in heap loop code.
  • w3/gifacemain.c, wh/gex.h, wsocket/serverace.c: add missing entries for new gex modal calls.
